tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE safety_compliance_data (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    compliance_date DATE,
    compliance_type VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_notes TEXT,
    compliance_result BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE safety_compliance_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_date DATE,
    compliance_type VARCHAR(50),
    violation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE safety_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    incident_description TEXT,
    employee_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE safety_training (
    training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    training_date DATE,
    training_type VARCHAR(50),
    training_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE safety_compliance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
  last_compliance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE safety_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  employee_involved VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE safety_trainings (
  training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  training_title VARCHAR(255),
  trainer_name VARCHAR(255),
  training_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE safety_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  reporter_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_text TEXT
)
